gui

Class TheGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.TheGui

  • public class TheGui
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe generatrice di tutti i componenti necessari per la GUI, menu, JFrame, le LeagueView
    Author:
    badjoker
